name: Petaling Street Heritage Food Walk
description: Let us share our passion for Delicious Malaysian Food with You!Simply Enak is a young business providing Food Experiences in the area of Kuala Lumpur Malaysia. We provide food walks in Petaling Street (China Town) as well as tailor-made Food Experiences. Come join us on a Food Experience bringing you to the most authentic places where you will taste the best of what Malaysia's cuisine has to offer!If you are interested in joining one of our food experiences do send us an email.We look forward to eating with you!
